other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm with no diagnostic abnormalities.
Noteworthy for a 2.5 mm hypodense region in the left frontal white matter, likely representing an old lacunar infarct.
Initial dosage of 300 mg at bedtime was prescribed for pain control.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Plan to gradually increase the dosage to 600 mg three times a day as tolerated.
